item.title: SPINE Has the Potential To Be the Next Sifu [PREVIEW]
item.description:
I played Sifu on my PS5 when it launched in February 2022, and to this day, it remains one of my favorite games in my PS5 library. Its roguelike structure was perfectly tuned, its environments were as engaging as they were beautiful, and its combat was enthralling. I still occasionally boot it up to run a level and keep my deaths as low as possible. It's remarkable then that, when I saw SPINE at Gamescom, my brain went straight to Sifu .

Whereas Sifu 's presentation is more traditional martial arts, SPINE focuses on cyberpunk aesthetics with Gun Fu-oriented combat. Players take on the role of Redline, a rebellious street artist, who has a combat implant called SPINE, and she uses the strength it gives her to fight an autocratic AI regime in search of her brother. What's more, SPINE is intelligent and would communicate with Redline, with developers telling us this is important to the story in the long run. We didn't get a good look at many story elements, understandably fitting the nature of the presentation. The presentation we saw at Gamescom was still very much an early-in-development build, complete with placeholders and incomplete features (such as text-to-speech instead of voice acting), but it managed to impress with its combat nonetheless.

SPINE's Combat is Cinematic and Stylish

Our hands-off presentation at Gamescom saw developers play through a few SPINE combat encounters: on the street, in a club, on a roof, down a hallway, and in other locales, ending in a boss fight against another SPINE user. The beat 'em up style of action gameplay looked top-notch because we identified very few repeat combos during the presentation; it was also clear how players could pull Redline in a certain direction to hit a nearby enemy, utilize the environment, and otherwise work their way through the game. She jumped around in true cinematic style, using various kung fu-style close-quarter attacks complementing those with her pistols. That's really enough to sell its Gun Fu/ John Wick -style fantasy, but that's not all Redline is capable of.

Multiple times, she would pick up weapons in combat, use them in ranged but also mostly close-quarter situations, hit enemies with them like a melee weapon, drop them, and move on. It seems her pistols are her typical weapon of choice, but picking up weapons and utilizing them goes a long way in terms of introducing new combos as well. On top of that, she is capable of using spray paint in combat as well since she is a street artist after all. Watching her spray an enemy and then lay into them with multiple hits was super exciting, thanks to its cinematic camera. Indeed, SPINE features a strong camera approach that emphasizes making the combat stylish, really highlighting all its cinematic moments to make it feel tuned well, speedy, but also movie-like. SPINE was as fun to watch as we assume it is to play.

SPINE is an Action Game to Watch

The final boss, as a SPINE user, featured different abilities from Redline. Her combat reflexes were geared as high as Redline, but she had the additional ability to control a massive swarm of drones. This combat shifted significantly from the gameplay thus far, as the demoist picked their moments to attack the boss while continuously fighting off the smaller adds. It still pulled out everything that enraptured us from the prior gameplay moments, but it clearly ratcheted up the combat scenario. Assuming every boss does this and assuming the combat retains the fun we saw here, SPINE looked absolutely incredible.

SPINE is still in development, with the developers telling me they were aiming for a release near the end of 2025. It remains to be seen if they can make that target and if the whole game lives up to this presentation, but one thing is clear to me: SPINE is one to watch.

item.title: Pokemon GO: How To Get Shiny Mega Salamence
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Pokemon GO: Get Shiny Salamence Through Mega Raids
  • Pokemon GO: Best Mega Salamence Raid Counters
  • Pokemon GO: How To Mega Evolve Shiny Salamence

Pokemon GO Mega Salamence Raids offer an opportunity to get a Shiny Salamence. Salamence comes as a Mega Raid Boss, and defeating it rewards a Salamence encounter with Shiny probability. Catching a Shiny Salamence is the first step to getting a Shiny Mega Salamence.

Although Pokemon GO players can occasionally find rare spawns like Salamence in the wild, winning Mega Raid guarantees a Salamence encounter. There is a better chance of encountering a Shiny Salamence through a Mega Salamence raid than any other method. But winning a Mega Raid is hard; the monster's prowess increases drastically as a Mega Raid Boss. That said, this guide details the best strategy to get a Shiny Mega Salamence in the game.

Pokemon GO: Get Shiny Salamence Through Mega Raids

Pokemon GO Salamence is a pseudo-legendary, and getting its Shiny variant is extremely challenging. Mega Salamence has a maximum Combat Power of 5688, which increases notably when it becomes a Mega Raid Boss. The monster has a stat spread of 310 ATK, 251 DEF, and 216 STA, making it one of the best attackers with amazing defensive abilities. The boosted maximum CP and balanced stat spread make it a powerhouse; you must team up with other players to win against such a powerful Mega Raid Boss.

You must win numerous Mega Salamence Raids to increase the chances of a Shiny Salamence encounter in Pokemon GO . The more Mega Raids you win, the more Salamence you encounter, and it might match its Shiny odds. But to achieve it, you have to choose strong Raid Counters based on Mega Salamence's weaknesses. The dual Dragon/Flying-type monster has several weaknesses but is most vulnerable against Ice-type attacks .

Pokemon GO: Mega Salamence Weaknesses

  • Ice-type moves
  • Dragon-type moves
  • Fairy-type moves
  • Rock-type moves

Pokemon GO: Mega Salamence Resistances

  • Bug-type moves
  • Fighting-type moves
  • Fire-type moves
  • Water-type moves
  • Grass-type moves
  • Ground-type moves

Pokemon GO: Best Mega Salamence Raid Counters

You must have proper counters to win Mega Salamence Raids. Counters with Ice-type moves that trigger the Same Type of Attack Bonus (STAB) can inflict the most damage against it. These are a few of the best Mega Salamence Raid counters in Pokemon GO .

Mega Salamence Counters

Fast Moves

Charged Moves

Shadow Mamoswine

Powder Snow (Ice-type)

Avalanche (Ice-type)

Shadow Weavile

Ice Shard (Ice-type)

Avalanche (Ice-type)

Galarian Standard Darmanitan

Ice Fang (Ice-type)

Avalanche (Ice-type)

Baxcalibur

Ice Fang (Ice-type)

Avalanche (Ice-type)

Shadow Mewtwo

Psycho Cut (Psychic-type)

Ice Beam (Ice-type)

Mamoswine

Powder Snow (Ice-type)

Avalanche (Ice-type)

Mega Glalie

Frost Breath (Ice-type)

Avalanche (Ice-type)

Shadow Mr. Rime

Ice Shard (Ice-type)

Triple Axel (Ice-type)

Cetitan

Ice Shard (Ice-type)

Avalanche (Ice-type)

Mega Gardevoir

Charm (Fairy-type)

Triple Axel (Ice-type)

Pokemon GO: How To Mega Evolve Shiny Salamence

After you catch a Shiny Salamence, you must Mega Evolve it into Shiny Mega Salamence. The requirement to Mega Evolve Shiny Salamence in Pokemon GO is 300 Mega Energy for the first time. For later times, all you need is 60 Mega Energy . You can get the required amount of Mega Energy by winning Mega Salamence Raids or completing featured Research tasks.

item.title: Roblox: RNG Combat Simulator Codes (August 2024)
item.description:
As the name suggests, RNG Combat Simulator combines certain types of Roblox games as RNG and Simulators. Therefore, players must roll various Auras to increase stats and fight other players for Stars. But, since at first, you will only come across the most common Auras, it is quite difficult to progress. To fix this, you should use RNG Combat Simulator codes.

With the help of codes, players can get free goodies in this Roblox experience in just a couple of clicks. And, some of them will reward you with many valuable Stars. But, if you do not hurry, the codes will expire, and their rewards will no longer be available.

All RNG Combat Simulator Codes

Working RNG Combat Simulator Codes

  • rngcombatsim - Redeem this code to get 500 Stars
  • starterstars - Redeem this code to get 1,500 Stars
  • summeregg - Redeem this code to get 50 Gems
  • ghaztguystudios - Redeem this code to get 500 Stars

Expired RNG Combat Simulator Codes

There are no expired codes in RNG Combat Simulator . We will update this article as soon as more codes become available.

Most of the time, you will be rolling Auras in RNG Combat Simulator . The rarer Auras you get, the more your stats will increase. But in addition to this, players will need Pets that increase multipliers. They can be obtained in exchange for Stars. However, the latter is only earned by battling in the style of Mountain Dawn on a separate island. Luckily, there is a way to get Stars from the very beginning much easier, namely RNG Combat Simulator codes.

Each code offers you a different number of Stars, from 50 to 1,500. So, even a few of them will help you get rare pets before your first battle. However, the codes are active for a limited time. So, you should use them while they are still valid.

How to Redeem RNG Combat Simulator Codes

Using RNG Combat Simulator codes is as easy as in other Roblox experiences. Just a few clicks separate you from free goodies. For convenience, we recommend following these simple steps to redeem codes:

  • First, launch RNG Combat Simulator .
  • Next, open Settings by clicking on the corresponding button on the left side of the screen.
  • After that, scroll down and enter the code. It is important to note that this experience is case-sensitive, so all codes must be lowercase.
  • Finally, click the Redeem button to receive your well-deserved rewards.

How to Get More RNG Combat Simulator Codes

To get more RNG Combat Simulator codes, players should bookmark this article. We will update it over time, as is the case with our other Roblox codes guides. In addition, you can visit the developers' official pages to get first-hand news:

  • GhaztGuy Studios X page

item.title: Jujutsu Duel Codes (August 2024)
item.description:
Jujutsu Duel is one of the hero-collecting RPGs based on the popular Jujutsu Kaisen manga. In it, players can assemble a party of various characters from the original franchise, including villains. But, you'll have to roll Gacha a lot to get your hands on the heroes you want. Or, you can use Jujutsu Duel codes.

These redemption codes reward players with several useful items. They include both Gems and Summoning Tickets, so you definitely won't want to miss them. However, the codes are only valid for a short time.

All Jujutsu Duel Codes

Working Jujutsu Duel Codes

  • HWFTK9C6S1 - Redeem this code to get 500K Cash, 300 Spirit Water, 60 Random Purple Shards, 2 Tengen Crystals, 300K EXP, 12H EXP Boost, 24H EXP Boost, 50 Yuji Shards, 24H Cash Boost, 3 Normal Blind Box Tickets, 200 Break Stones, 1200 Gems, and 10 Advanced Summoning Tickets
  • JK666 - Redeem this code to get 200 Gems and an Advanced Summoning Ticket
  • JK777 - Redeem this code to get 100K Cash and 200K EXP
  • JK888 - Redeem this code to get 100 Break Stones and an Advanced Summoning Ticket

Expired Jujutsu Duel Codes

There are no expired codes in Jujutsu Duel . We will update this article as soon as more codes become available.

Jujutsu Duel takes the best from the original, as it offers a variety of characters instead of killing them off in the story. Everyone is divided into different Gacha banners, so of course, getting the best of the best heroes is quite difficult. It will require quite a lot of time on grinding, as well as investing Gems. However, the unique abilities of the characters are worth all your efforts. Fortunately, the developers often release Jujutsu Duel codes that will speed up your progression.

Most of these codes offer only a few rewards, albeit quite valuable. However, some can reward you with many useful items, including currencies, EXP, boosters, and much more. But it is important to note that after a certain time, each code expires in Jujutsu Duel . Therefore, we strongly recommend that you use them as soon as possible.

How to Redeem Jujutsu Duel Codes

Using Jujutsu Duel codes is as simple as in most other Gacha RPGs. Just follow these steps and you will get your free goodies now:

  • First, launch Jujutsu Duel .
  • Then go through the tutorial if you haven't done so already.
  • After that, click on the profile icon in the upper left corner and select the Redeem option.
  • Finally, enter the code and click the Redeem button.
  • If you do everything correctly and the code is still active, you will see a message about receiving your rewards.

How to Get More Jujutsu Duel Codes

To stay up to date with new Jujutsu Duel codes, you should check this guide from time to time. Just like with Roblox codes, we will update it as soon as the developers release new free goodies. Alternatively, you can visit the official page of the game:

  • Jujutsu Duel Facebook page

Jujutsu Duel is available on mobile devices.

item.title: 7 Best Final Fantasy 14 Mods You Should Try
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • FFXIV thrives with Dawntrail expansion, popular for its immersive MSQ, raids, and friendly community.
  • Essential mods like XIVLauncher and Dalamud enhance login speed and provide access to popular plugins.
  • Market Board plugin aids in price comparison, while Collections addon helps track collected items in FFXIV.

Final Fantasy 14 is an MMORPG brimming with life and a healthy player base, with the release of its new expansion, Dawntrail , building hype and excitement in the FFXIV community. Since Shadowbringers and Endwalker , FFXIV has seen a significant uptick in popularity thanks to its immersive and compelling MSQ, unique raids, and caring community, which sees the game thrive as one of the leading MMORPGs of its era.

When it comes to its community, many of its players have built on the game's foundations, creating mods, plugins, and addons that add to the FFXIV experience. Several of these mods enhance and improve the player's experience, with many of the addons bringing fun and added options to FFXIV .

7 XIVLauncher/Dalamud

Removes Login And Offers Database Full Of Mods

  • Download Link : XIVLauncher/Dalamud
  • Mod Creator : goatcorp

In FFXIV , XIVLauncher is one of the most necessary plugins to access, giving players an instant login that does not require entering a username and password whenever launching. With the reduced launch time, players are able to access the game quicker, saving time if in a rush to catch an in-game event such as a hunt.

Accompanying XIVLauncher is the Dalamud plugin, which enables players to see hundreds of mods and plugins available to install, with Dalamud having options to highlight the most popular and most downloaded. The XIVLauncher and Dalamud combination are essential mods that not only give an improved login speed, but its mod database makes it easy for players to access new and popular plugins that improve FFXIV .

6 Simple Tweaks Plugin

Minor Fixes That Improve Quality Of Life

  • Download Link : Simple Tweaks Plugin
  • Mod Creator : Caraxi

One of the most popular and in-demand mods in FFXIV is the Simple Tweaks Plugin, which improves the quality of life in FFXIV through minor fixes being implemented. With over 5 million downloads, players use the Simple Tweaks Plugin to enhance gameplay, with features such as duty timers, accurate venture times, and the pressing of alt + F4 to close the game down safely all being available fixes.

With users being able to select fixes that they identify as necessary, the plugin helps Warriors of Light improve their day-to-day lives on FFXIV , even with such minor tweaks.

5 Market Board

Plugin That Enables Players To See Marketboard Prices For All Data Centers And Worlds

  • Download Link : Market Board
  • Mod Creator : fmauNeko

FFXIV's marketboard is home to millions of items ranging from armor pieces to mounts, with the demand for many specific items being intense. To help see the price of items outside a player's home world, the Market Board plugin enables players to examine all Data Centers and worlds to see a price comparison, showing the best value on the market.

Alongside its price comparison, the plugin shows past sales and in-depth charts to illustrate the items' performance on the market, with the tool being very beneficial for frequent users of the marketboard who acquire items from different expansions of FFXIV .

4 Collections

Ideal For Collection Connoisseurs

  • Download Link : Collections
  • Mod Creator : Seventh

Like many other MMORPGs, much of the FFXIV community are avid collectors of items ranging from mounts to orchestrion rolls. With the Collections addon enabled, players can see the number of specific items they have collected in each category, with the addon having the option of selecting all obtained or unobtained items.

From emotes to gearsets, the collection of these items can be filtered through the content they are obtained from, with Gil, PvP, and duties filters helping players gauge their collection and where to potentially attain unobtained items.

3 Chat Bubbles

Improves Social Aspect Of FFXIV

  • Download Link : Chat Bubbles
  • Mod Creator : Haplo064, Khayle

FFXIV's community ranks as one of the most pleasant and kind in the MMORPG genre, with the player base creating a safe space where players cultivate friendships on a daily basis. However, the game is one of the few MMORPGs to lack chat bubbles, an essential feature used frequently for the social experience of the genre. To enhance the social experience in populated areas, the use of the Chat Bubbles plugin allows players to see chat messages more easily, making socializing on FFXIV more optimal.

For players lounging around in Limsa Lominsa or New Gridana, chat bubbles make the areas feel more alive and vibrant. At the same time, user-held nightclubs and social get-togethers would be enhanced by implementing the feature.

2 Anamnesis

Glamour Tool Enabling Players To Tryout Armor And Weapon Sets

  • Download Link : Anamnesis
  • Mod Creator : Yuki, Ani-ki, Peebs-miqo, AsgardXIV, chirpxiv

A significant aspect of FFXIV is glamour, with the FFXIV community having many players keen on crafting glamour sets to show off their designs and creativity. One of the mods glamour enjoyers gravitate towards is Anamnesis, which allows players to access every armor piece and weapon, perfect for taking screenshots of characters and their outfits.

Anamnesis not only enables the use of unavailable weapons and armor pieces, but the mod also provides players the chance to alter the weather and time of day, as well as the camera angle, making Anamnesis perfect for activities such as Gposing with friends.

1 ACT - Advanced Combat Tracker

Plugin Used For Raid Logging And Parsing

  • Download Link : Advanced Combat Tracker
  • Mod Creator : EQAditu

In most MMORPGs, the crux of a game and its success balances on its raid series, with fights aiming to be unique and challenging as players push for strong parsing logs. For FFXIV , ACT, the Advanced Combat Tracker, is the essential plugin for raiding, allowing players to record themselves and their party's performance, with stats like damage, healing, and mitigation listed.

Not only does ACT show a player's performance, but the plugin records a log, which can be uploaded to the FFLog website, enabling players to see how their performance compares to other Warriors of Light on specific raids and jobs.
